email_text:
Subject: Your Delta Flight Itinerary Confirmation

Dear [Passenger's Name],

Thank you for choosing Delta Airlines for your upcoming flight. Below are the details of your itinerary:

Flight Confirmation Number: DL123456789
Departure Date: [Date]
Departure Time: [Time]
Departure Airport: [Airport]
Arrival Airport: [Airport]
Flight Number: DL123
Seat Number: [Seat Number]
Baggage Allowance: 1 carry-on and 1 personal item

To check-in for your flight, please click on the following link: [Check-in Link]

We recommend that you arrive at the airport at least 2 hours before your scheduled departure time. If you have any questions or need assistance, feel free to contact our customer service team at [Customer Service Number].

We look forward to welcoming you on board and wish you a pleasant journey with Delta Airlines.

Safe travels,

Delta Airlines Team
